divs: sighting details mygrandmother and boys (tim was 5 and tony was 4) and i were driving downmiamisburg\springboro road in july\august 1966 at 4:30 or 5:00 pm. the day wasclear but not real bright. when we approached shepard road my grandmother said,"look.". i pulled the car over and we saw an object hanging over the road on theright. it was bright, shiny, saucer-shaped and hovered in the sky. the windowswere down and we heard no sound or hum. we witnessed it a minute or two. we thendrove on to wood road, where we paused to turn right. i asked if it was stillwith us. grandmother said it was. the object followed us (off to the right) as idrove 35 - 40 mph. we could see it through the tree line. it was in the airabout 2 1\2 times above the line. it passed us until we turned right onto woodroad. we looked back - it was still there. it hovered a few seconds and thentook off - didnt ascend too fast. at the bottom of the saucer was a row oflights that blinked in sequence from right to left to right.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Springboro
There were no other sightings in Springboro on or around June 30th 1966
